name: vscode-taskexplorer
description: Tasks management for npm, vscode, yarn, ant, gradle, grunt, gulp, batch, bash,php composer, make, maven, python, perl, powershell, ruby, pipenv, nsis, jenkins.  Supports external task providers via API.

scripts.clean: rimraf dist && npm run clean:webviews && npm run test:clean
scripts.clean:webviews: rimraf res/css && rimraf res/js && rimraf res/page
scripts.test-ant: npm run tsc-build_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js ant xDeactivate
scripts.test-ant_mws: npm run tsc-build_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js ant xDeactivate --multi-root
scripts.test-app_publisher: npm run tsc-build_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js appPublisher xDeactivate
scripts.test-bash: npm run tsc-build_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js bash xDeactivate
scripts.test-batch: npm run tsc-build_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js batch xDeactivate
scripts.test-composer: npm run tsc-build_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js composer xDeactivate
scripts.test-configuration: npm run tsc-build_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js configuration xDeactivate
scripts.test-external_provider: npm run tsc-build_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js externalProvider xDeactivate
scripts.test-file_cache: npm run tsc-build_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js fileCache xDeactivate
scripts.test-file_cache_mws: npm run tsc-build_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js fileCache xDeactivate --multi-root
scripts.test-file_watcher: npm run tsc-build_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js fileWatcher xDeactivate
scripts.test-file_watcher_mws: npm run tsc-build_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js fileWatcher xDeactivate --multi-root
scripts.test-gradle: npm run tsc-build_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js gradle xDeactivate
scripts.test-grunt: npm run tsc-build_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js grunt xDeactivate
scripts.test-gulp: npm run tsc-build_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js gulp xDeactivate
scripts.test-jenkins: npm run tsc-build_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js jenkins xDeactivate
scripts.test-infopage: npm run tsc-build_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js infoPage xDeactivate
scripts.test-licensemgr: npm run tsc-build_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js licenseManager xDeactivate
scripts.test-makefile: npm run tsc-build_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js makefile xDeactivate
scripts.test-maven: npm run tsc-build_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js maven xDeactivate
scripts.test-menu_commands: npm run tsc-build_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js menuCommands xDeactivate
scripts.test-multi_root: npm run tsc-build_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js multiRoot xDeactivate
scripts.test-multi_root_mws: npm run tsc-build_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js multiRoot xDeactivate --multi-root
scripts.test-no_scripts: npm run tsc-build_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js noScripts xDeactivate
scripts.test-npm: npm run tsc-build_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js npm xDeactivate
scripts.test-nsis: npm run tsc-build_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js nsis xDeactivate
scripts.test-perl: npm run tsc-build_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js perl xDeactivate
scripts.test-pipenv: npm run tsc-build_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js pipenv xDeactivate
scripts.test-powershell: npm run tsc-build_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js powershell xDeactivate
scripts.test-providers: npm run tsc-build_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js providers xDeactivate
scripts.test-python: npm run tsc-build_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js python xDeactivate
scripts.test-release_notes: npm run tsc-build_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js releaseNotes xDeactivate
scripts.test-ruby: npm run tsc-build_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js ruby xDeactivate
scripts.test-tasks: npm run tsc-build_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js tasks xDeactivate
scripts.test-tasks_mws: npm run tsc-build_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js tasks xDeactivate --multi-root
scripts.test-tree: npm run tsc-build_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js tree xDeactivate
scripts.test-tree_grouping: npm run tsc-build_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js treeGrouping xDeactivate
scripts.test-typescript: npm run tsc-build_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js typescript xDeactivate
scripts.test-webpack: npm run tsc-build_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js webpack xDeactivate
scripts.test-webview: npm run tsc-build_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js webview xDeactivate
scripts.test-workspace: npm run tsc-build_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js workspace xDeactivate
scripts.test-wrapper: npm run tsc-build_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js wrapper xDeactivate
scripts.test-util: npm run tsc-build_test && node ./dist/test/runTest.js util xDeactivate
scripts.test:before: npm run tsc-build_test && npm run test-coverage-full_on
scripts.tsc-rebuild: rimraf dist && npm run tsc-build && npm run tsc-build_types
scripts.tsc-rebuild_test: rimraf dist && npm run tsc-rebuild_types && npm run tsc-build_test
scripts.tsc-rebuild_types: rimraf types/tsconfig.tsbuildinfo && rimraf types/lib && rimraf node_modules/@spmeesseman/vscode-taskexplorer-types/lib && npm run tsc-build_types

commands.title: Task Explorer: Show Log in Output Window

explorer/context.when: explorerViewletVisible && filesExplorerFocus && !explorerResourceIsRoot && !inputFocus && resourceScheme == file && resourcePath in vscodeTaskExplorer.taskFiles
explorerViewletVisible && filesExplorerFocus && !explorerResourceIsRoot && !inputFocus && resourceScheme == file && resourcePath not in vscodeTaskExplorer.taskFiles
explorerViewletVisible && filesExplorerFocus && !explorerResourceIsRoot && !inputFocus && resourceScheme == file && resourcePath in vscodeTaskExplorer.taskFiles
explorerViewletVisible && filesExplorerFocus && !explorerResourceIsRoot && !inputFocus && resourceScheme == file && resourcePath not in vscodeTaskExplorer.taskFiles

pattern.regexp:
^The terminal process *["']?([A-Za-z\.0-9\/\-_\\]+) +([A-Za-z \.0-9\/\-_\\"']+) +(?:failed to launch \(|terminated with )exit code\:? *([0-9]+)\s*(?:\.|\))[
]{2,3}^(.+)
^('(.+)' is not recognized as an internal or external command)
